attributes.action: Compulsory purchase the Coventry Peugeot site for £1 and create a world beating UK vehicle manufacturing base
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Don't let this manufacturing asset become a redundant brownfield site destined for profiteering redevelopment.
We NEED a world beating UK manufacturing base for vehicles, both commercial and domestic.
The West Midlands has the talent and skills to make this happen under Government leadership.
Don't let it become another Rover style management rip-off either!!!!
